page.title: 10FARRINGDON SERVICES
page.content: The village has water,gas and electricity but no mains drainage. A general stores/post office is sited at the crossroads and opposite is a game shop selling pheasant and venison etc. The Royal Oak and Rose and Crown public houses are quite popular. There is a quite frequent daily bus service(not Sundays) along the main road into Alton but only a single service through the village on Tuesdays and Fridays. There are two postal deliveries and collections on weekdays. Milk is delivered except Sundays. Dustbins are emptied weekly. There are two public telephone kiosks and a police house.
